body: Elzine, I was able to run your file without any difficulties: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/fjCJhks0XLsRQ5tTpzPUiD8pERAfpyHePWd7bKfpDJsCxilVH9tKhXcoXGAyeyRaO7pSU*Sd1h*QQNPzHeb7V9iVYuc0f3Z*/ThermalAutonomy.JPG) I noticed that your grid size was originally very coarse, yielding only two test points for the zone but this did not stop the file from running correctly.  Do you remember the error that you got?  If you were running it on a computer that is not really built for parallel processing, it could have been the result of the parallel process failing.  Let me know if the attached file works and, if not, what the error message is. -Chris
